title: Creating an account
subtitle: Quick, easy, and free
description: You can create an account with just your name, email, and a password. It's free forever, so you'll never have to worry about paying to access your data or create resumes.

steps.description: Go to https://silocv.com/sign-up or click the 'Sign Up' button in the header of this page.
Fill out the required fields with your name, email, and a password.

steps: Passwords must be at least 8 characters.
You can only sign up with a particular email once. If it's already been used you won't be able to sign up for a new account.
If your email was previously used, you can reset the password to the account at https://silocv.com/forgot-password.

steps.description: Click 'Sign Up' to create your account and log in.
Have fun! Go land that dream job.
